name: fullstack-serverless
description: Full-stack serverless application with Next.js, AWS Lambda, and Terraform

scripts.build:all: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean:backend && cd frontend && rm -rf .next
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build:all && npm run package:lambda && cd infra && terraform apply -auto-approve
scripts.deploy:prod: NODE_ENV=production npm run build:all && npm run package:lambda && cd infra && terraform apply -var='environment=prod' -auto-approve
